00011 /**
00012  * @brief Initializes variables, that are necessary for fast reading of data from memory.
00013  */
00014 void oru_walk::initFastRead()
00015 {
00016     // Sensors names
00017     vector<string> fSensorKeys;
00018 
00019     fSensorKeys.clear();
00020 
00021     //  Here as an example /*inertial*/ + joints + /*FSR*/ are read
00022     fSensorKeys.resize(/*7 +*/ JOINTS_NUM /*+ 6*/);
00023 
00024     // Joints Sensor list
00025     fSensorKeys[HEAD_PITCH]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00026     fSensorKeys[HEAD_YAW]         = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadYaw/Position/Sensor/Value");
00027 
00028     fSensorKeys[L_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnklePitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00029     fSensorKeys[L_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnkleRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00030     fSensorKeys[L_ELBOW_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LElbowRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00031     fSensorKeys[L_ELBOW_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LElbowYaw/Position/Sensor/Value");
00032     fSensorKeys[L_HIP_PITCH]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00033     fSensorKeys[L_HIP_ROLL]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00034     fSensorKeys[L_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipYawPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00035     fSensorKeys[L_KNEE_PITCH]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LKneePitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00036     fSensorKeys[L_SHOULDER_PITCH] = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LShoulderPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00037     fSensorKeys[L_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LShoulderRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00038     fSensorKeys[L_WRIST_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LWristYaw/Position/Sensor/Value");
00039 
00040     fSensorKeys[R_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnklePitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00041     fSensorKeys[R_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnkleRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00042     fSensorKeys[R_ELBOW_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RElbowRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00043     fSensorKeys[R_ELBOW_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RElbowYaw/Position/Sensor/Value");
00044     fSensorKeys[R_HIP_PITCH]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00045     fSensorKeys[R_HIP_ROLL]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00046     // note, that R_HIP_YAW_PITCH is controlled by the same motor as L_HIP_YAW_PITCH 
00047     fSensorKeys[R_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipYawPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00048     fSensorKeys[R_KNEE_PITCH]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RKneePitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00049     fSensorKeys[R_SHOULDER_PITCH] = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00050     fSensorKeys[R_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderRoll/Position/Sensor/Value");
00051     fSensorKeys[R_WRIST_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RWristYaw/Position/Sensor/Value");
00052 
00053     // Create the fast memory access
00054     accessSensorValues->ConnectToVariables(getParentBroker(), fSensorKeys, false);
00055 
00056 
00057     // Joints Sensor list
00058     fSensorKeys[HEAD_PITCH]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00059     fSensorKeys[HEAD_YAW]         = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00060 
00061     fSensorKeys[L_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnklePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00062     fSensorKeys[L_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnkleRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00063     fSensorKeys[L_ELBOW_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LElbowRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00064     fSensorKeys[L_ELBOW_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LElbowYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00065     fSensorKeys[L_HIP_PITCH]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00066     fSensorKeys[L_HIP_ROLL]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00067     fSensorKeys[L_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipYawPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00068     fSensorKeys[L_KNEE_PITCH]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LKneePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00069     fSensorKeys[L_SHOULDER_PITCH] = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LShoulderPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00070     fSensorKeys[L_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LShoulderRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00071     fSensorKeys[L_WRIST_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LWristYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00072 
00073     fSensorKeys[R_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnklePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00074     fSensorKeys[R_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnkleRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00075     fSensorKeys[R_ELBOW_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RElbowRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00076     fSensorKeys[R_ELBOW_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RElbowYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00077     fSensorKeys[R_HIP_PITCH]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00078     fSensorKeys[R_HIP_ROLL]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00079     // note, that R_HIP_YAW_PITCH is controlled by the same motor as L_HIP_YAW_PITCH 
00080     fSensorKeys[R_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipYawPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00081     fSensorKeys[R_KNEE_PITCH]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RKneePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00082     fSensorKeys[R_SHOULDER_PITCH] = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00083     fSensorKeys[R_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00084     fSensorKeys[R_WRIST_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RWristYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00085 
00086     // Create the fast memory access
00087     accessActuatorValues->ConnectToVariables(getParentBroker(), fSensorKeys, false);
00088 }

00092 /**
00093  * @brief Initializes variables, that are necessary for fast sending of parameters to DCM.
00094  */
00095 void oru_walk::initFastWrite()
00096 {
00097     ALValue jointAliases;
00098 
00099     jointAliases.arraySetSize(2);
00100     jointAliases[1].arraySetSize(JOINTS_NUM);
00101 
00102     // positions of actuators.
00103     jointAliases[0] = std::string("jointActuator"); // Alias for all joint actuators
00104     // Joints actuator list
00105     jointAliases[1][HEAD_PITCH]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00106     jointAliases[1][HEAD_YAW]         = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00107     jointAliases[1][L_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnklePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00108     jointAliases[1][L_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnkleRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00109     jointAliases[1][L_ELBOW_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LElbowRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00110     jointAliases[1][L_ELBOW_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LElbowYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00111     jointAliases[1][L_HIP_PITCH]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00112     jointAliases[1][L_HIP_ROLL]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00113     jointAliases[1][L_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipYawPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");

00116     jointAliases[1][L_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LShoulderRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00117     jointAliases[1][L_WRIST_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LWristYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00118 
00119     jointAliases[1][R_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnklePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00120     jointAliases[1][R_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnkleRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");

00125     // note, that R_HIP_YAW_PITCH is controlled by the same motor as L_HIP_YAW_PITCH 
00126     jointAliases[1][R_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipYawPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00127     jointAliases[1][R_KNEE_PITCH]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RKneePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00128     jointAliases[1][R_SHOULDER_PITCH] = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00129     jointAliases[1][R_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00130     jointAliases[1][R_WRIST_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RWristYaw/Position/Actuator/Value");
00131 
00132     // Create alias
00133     try
00134     {
00135         dcmProxy->createAlias(jointAliases);
00136     }
00137     catch (const ALError &e)
00138     {
00139         throw ALERROR(getName(), __FUNCTION__, "Error when creating Alias : " + e.toString());
00140     }
00141 
00142 
00143 
00144     //  stiffness of actuators.
00145     jointAliases[0] = std::string("jointStiffness"); // Alias for all actuators
00146     jointAliases[1][HEAD_PITCH]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadPitch/Hardness/Actuator/Value");
00147     jointAliases[1][HEAD_YAW]         = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/HeadYaw/Hardness/Actuator/Value");

00166     // note, that R_HIP_YAW_PITCH is controlled by the same motor as L_HIP_YAW_PITCH 
00167     jointAliases[1][R_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipYawPitch/Hardness/Sensor/Value");

00169     jointAliases[1][R_SHOULDER_PITCH] = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderPitch/Hardness/Actuator/Value");
00170     jointAliases[1][R_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RShoulderRoll/Hardness/Actuator/Value");
00171     jointAliases[1][R_WRIST_YAW]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RWristYaw/Hardness/Actuator/Value");
00172 
00173     // Create alias
00174     try
00175     {
00176         dcmProxy->createAlias(jointAliases);
00177     }
00178     catch (const ALError &e)
00179     {
00180         throw ALERROR(getName(), __FUNCTION__, "Error when creating Alias : " + e.toString());
00181     }
00182 
00183 
00184 
00185     // access to the actuators in the lower body only
00186     jointAliases[1].clear();
00187     jointAliases[1].arraySetSize(LOWER_JOINTS_NUM);
00188 
00189     // positions of actuators.
00190     jointAliases[0] = std::string("lowerJointActuator"); // Alias for all joint actuators
00191     // Joints actuator list
00192     jointAliases[1][L_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnklePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00193     jointAliases[1][L_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LAnkleRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00194     jointAliases[1][L_HIP_PITCH]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00195     jointAliases[1][L_HIP_ROLL]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00196     jointAliases[1][L_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LHipYawPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00197     jointAliases[1][L_KNEE_PITCH]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/LKneePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00198 
00199     jointAliases[1][R_ANKLE_PITCH]    = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnklePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00200     jointAliases[1][R_ANKLE_ROLL]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RAnkleRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00201     jointAliases[1][R_HIP_PITCH]      = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipPitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00202     jointAliases[1][R_HIP_ROLL]       = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipRoll/Position/Actuator/Value");
00203     // note, that R_HIP_YAW_PITCH is controlled by the same motor as L_HIP_YAW_PITCH 
00204     jointAliases[1][R_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RHipYawPitch/Position/Sensor/Value");
00205     jointAliases[1][R_KNEE_PITCH]     = std::string("Device/SubDeviceList/RKneePitch/Position/Actuator/Value");
00206 
00207     // Create alias
00208     try
00209     {
00210         dcmProxy->createAlias(jointAliases);
00211     }
00212     catch (const ALError &e)
00213     {
00214         throw ALERROR(getName(), __FUNCTION__, "Error when creating Alias : " + e.toString());
00215     }

00220 /**
00221  * @brief Initialize commands, that will be sent to DCM.
00222  */
00223 void oru_walk::initWalkCommands()
00224 {
00225     // create the structure of the commands
00226     walkCommands.arraySetSize(6);
00227     walkCommands[0] = string("lowerJointActuator");
00228     walkCommands[1] = string("ClearAll");
00229     walkCommands[2] = string("time-separate");
00230     walkCommands[3] = 0;
00231 
00232     walkCommands[4].arraySetSize(1);
00233 
00234     walkCommands[5].arraySetSize(LOWER_JOINTS_NUM); // For all joints
00235     for (int i=0; i < LOWER_JOINTS_NUM; i++)
00236     {
00237         walkCommands[5][i].arraySetSize(1);
00238     }
00239 }

00242 void oru_walk::initJointAngles()
00243 {
00244     init_joint_angles[L_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  =  0.0;
00245     // note, that R_HIP_YAW_PITCH is controlled by the same motor as L_HIP_YAW_PITCH 
00246     init_joint_angles[R_HIP_YAW_PITCH]  =  0.0;
00247 
00248     init_joint_angles[L_HIP_ROLL]       = -0.000384;
00249     init_joint_angles[L_HIP_PITCH]      = -0.598291;
00250     init_joint_angles[L_KNEE_PITCH]     =  1.009413;
00251     init_joint_angles[L_ANKLE_PITCH]    = -0.492352;
00252     init_joint_angles[L_ANKLE_ROLL]     =  0.000469;
00253 
00254     init_joint_angles[R_HIP_ROLL]       = -0.000384;
00255     init_joint_angles[R_HIP_PITCH]      = -0.598219;
00256     init_joint_angles[R_KNEE_PITCH]     =  1.009237;
00257     init_joint_angles[R_ANKLE_PITCH]    = -0.492248;
00258     init_joint_angles[R_ANKLE_ROLL]     =  0.000469;
00259 
00260     init_joint_angles[L_SHOULDER_PITCH] =  1.418908;
00261     init_joint_angles[L_SHOULDER_ROLL]  =  0.332836;
00262     init_joint_angles[L_ELBOW_YAW]      = -1.379108;
00263     init_joint_angles[L_ELBOW_ROLL]     = -1.021602;
00264     init_joint_angles[L_WRIST_YAW]      = -0.013848;
00265 
00266     init_joint_angles[R_SHOULDER_PITCH] =  1.425128;
00267     init_joint_angles[R_SHOULDER_ROLL]  = -0.331386;
00268     init_joint_angles[R_ELBOW_YAW]      =  1.383626;
00269     init_joint_angles[R_ELBOW_ROLL]     =  1.029356;
00270     init_joint_angles[R_WRIST_YAW]      = -0.01078; 
00271 
00272     init_joint_angles[HEAD_PITCH]       =  0.0;     
00273     init_joint_angles[HEAD_YAW]         =  0.0;
00274 }
